title: L4 Commit Arbitration Input Payload
description: Schema defining the mandatory quantitative scores provided by the L3 assessment layer for L4 GTCM validation against defined thresholds.

commit_hash.description: The unique identifier (SHA hash) of the proposed code commit package.

metrics.description: Standardized quantified assessments provided by the L3 scoring module.

S01_Efficacy_Score.description: The projected utility/efficacy score (0.0 - 1.0). Must meet or exceed GTCM.S01_Efficacy_Threshold.

S02_Risk_Score.description: The synthesized systemic risk score (0.0 - 1.0). Must be less than or equal to GTCM.S02_Risk_Tolerance.

model_version.description: Version of the predictive model used for L3 assessment.
